Posts.Content: MonicaAnne123 wrote: Any advice on trying to maintain some life routine normalcy as you adjust to treatment? I have a 10 year old daughter and I am certain that she would benefit from as much normalcy as possible. I just don't know how to go about it without being able to gauge how I will feel. Also does anyone else suffer from anxiety? Dx 2/22/2012, IDC, Stage IV, ER+, HER2+ Targeted Therapy 3/21/2012 Herceptin (trastuzumab) Chemotherapy 3/21/2012 Taxol (paclitaxel) Targeted Therapy 8/29/2012 Perjeta (pertuzumab) Chemotherapy 8/29/2012 Taxotere (docetaxel) Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Getting a routine together MonicaAnne123 nancyh
